CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position + Vector3(self.direction, 0, 0) * self.speed
self.time = self.time + delta if self.time >= self.lifeTime then self.Entity:Destroy() end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.direction < 0 then self.direction = -1 else self.direction = 1 end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity --------------------------------------------------------- TriggerBodyEntity.HitComponent:OnHit(self.Entity, self.damage, false, "", 1)
